name: GENEVIEVE Piturro

jv_history.partner_name: Meet Genevieve Piturro: From TV Sales to Founding the Pajama Program
jv_history.source_quote: Meet Genevieve Piturro: From TV Sales to Founding the Pajama Program] In the latest episode of This Kaleidoscope Career Podcast, I spoke with a truly inspirational guest, Gen

what_you_do: Genevieve Piturro is an international TEDx speaker, author, consultant and founder of Pajama Program and Purpose ACER.
who_you_serve: Purpose-driven leaders who want to transform outdated leadership mindsets into true power.
offering: Genevieve works with leaders to provide clear, courageous communication, real human connection, and purpose worth committing to, resulting in energized teams, stronger relationships, and sustainable growth.
social_proof: Genevieve has been featured on Oprah, The Kelly Clarkson Show, and has worked with companies like JP Morgan Chase and Carter's.
signature_programs: Genevieve is the author of books and has developed exercises and coaching programs to help people find their purpose.
business_focus: Genevieve works with purpose-driven leaders to transform outdated leadership mindsets into true power through clear communication, human connection, and purpose.
